DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine single dose pharmacokinetics daptomycin consecutively 10 patient three different time point severe burn injury .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Single-dose Pharmacokinetics Intravenous Daptomycin Patients With Thermal Injury
DOC.criteria: Male female 18 year old Second and/or third degree thermal injury Total body surface area burn ≥ 15 % Hospitalisation ICU burn injure patient University Hospital Zürich Probability ICU stay > 14 day Written inform consent patient patient unable informed sign accord section 4.4 study protocol Evidence renal failure ( Creatinine clearance < 30ml/min ) continuous renal replacement therapy continuous hemofiltration History muscle disease skeletal muscle disorder Creatinephosphokinase ( CPK ) ≥ 5 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) History hypersensitivity drug Pregnancy Severe coagulation disorder
